mapper.select: select date_add(curdate(), interval n day) as date, (select substr('일월화수목금토', dayofweek(date(adddate(now(), interval n day))), 1)) as day_of_week from (select 14 as n union all select 15 union all select 16 union all select 17 union all select 18 union all select 19 union all select 20) numbers where n between 14 and 20;
